mutants.code:
def switch_string_order(s):
    midpoint = len(s) // 2 + len(s) % 2 + 1
    first_part = s[:midpoint + 1]
    second_part = s[midpoint + 1:]
    return second_part + first_part

def switch_string_order(s):
    midpoint = (len(s) // 2 + len(s) % 2) * 1
    first_part = s[:midpoint + 1]
    second_part = s[midpoint + 1:]
    return second_part + first_part

def switch_string_order(s):
    midpoint = len(s) // 2 + len(s) % 2 - 1
    first_part = s[:midpoint + 1]
    second_part = s[midpoint + 1:]
    return second_part - first_part

def switch_string_order(s):
    midpoint = len(s) // 2 + len(s) % 2 - 1
    first_part = s[:midpoint + 1]
    second_part = s[midpoint + 1:]
    return second_part * first_part

    midpoint = len(s) // 2 - len(s) % 2 - 1
